attributes.action: make St.Georges day a National holiday!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Nearly every country in the world celebrates it's Saints day, it's date of liberation, it's date of independence, etc with a national holiday, but not England.

We believe that St.Georges day should be that day (even if it means giving up one of the 2 Bank holidays in May). We also believe this National event will encourage better citizenship and patriotism.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
